channel.title: musk on vblinden
channel.description: Recent content in musk on vblinden

item.title: What did you undesign?
item.description: In the video above Eric Berger from Ars Technica asks the question on how Elon Musk and the team at SpaceX build the iteration of Starship within 4/5 months and how they’d go so fast. Here is the transcript for those who want to read instead of listening: Eric Berger: How did you go so fast? Elon Musk: I have this mantra: if the schedule is long, it’s wrong.
